properties.comment: Model parameter definition ========================== Model : HeatExchanger Type : Example Parameters ---------- DensityCf [kg/m3] density of the moved cooling fluid EffPump [-] Efficency of the cooling fluid pump EERCooling [-] Energy efficency ratio of the cooling circle MassFlowSamples [kg/s] Pump mass flow samples from the characteristic map PressureSamples [Pa] Pressure drops over the pump corresponding to the flow samples
